title: Congratulations Stefan Hattenbach
content: Stefan, congratulations on your new association with Font Shop via PsyOps.
author: BruceS63

comments.content:
Thanks Bruce,

It feels nice to have a more complete overview in FontShop, and not just the ones from Fountain. And as Stpehen Coles always said Psy/Ops is one of the best kept secrets. Psy/Ops deserves more exposure.

[Always look where your posts are going]

Since I'm here, though, congrats!
